io.druid.segment.data

Interface Offset

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ReadableOffset
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayBasedOffset, BitmapOffset, IntersectingOffset, StartLimitedOffset, UnioningOffset

    public interface Offset
extends ReadableOffset
    The "mutable" version of a ReadableOffset. Introduces "increment()" and "withinBounds()" methods, which are very similar to "next()" and "hasNext()" on the Iterator interface except increment() does not return a value.

    • Method Summary

      void increment() 
      boolean withinBounds()
